edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.persistence
Class XTFClient

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.persistence.XTFClient

public class XTFClient
extends java.lang.Object

XTFClient accesses XTF repository through the XTF search servlet.

Its key function is to take a raw XML query generated in the query processor and execute agaist the raw servlet, and then return a list of matching documents.

Author:
Xin Xiang

Constructor Detail

XTFClient

public XTFClient()
Creates a new XTFClient instance. If the property file xtf.properties is present, the property values in that file are used. Otherwise the default values are used.

setFileURL

private void setFileURL(XTFDoc doc,
                        java.lang.String identifier,
                        java.lang.String type)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Sets the file URL property values based on the METS document. The file URL can be used for retrieval of the content of the item.

Parameters:
doc - XTFDoc object
identifier - the identifier element in query result

java.lang.Exception
